item.title: Cs61a Notes
item.description: 环境 闭包 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 def make_adder(n): """Return a function that takes one arguments k and returns k + n >>> add_three = make_adder(3) >>> add_three(4) 7 """ def adder(k): return k + n return adder
